item.title: Exercise Session 3
item.description: In this session, you will learn how to finetune SBERT embeddings and use them in downstream tasks. They will also practice using SBERT in a variety of business scenarios. Hate Speech Dataset Online hate speech on social media networks can influence hate violence and even crimes against a certain group of people in this digital age. According to FBI statistics, hate-related attacks on specific groups of people are at a 16-year high [1].
